tests.name: Test CPP implementation
tests.setup: cd cpp; mkdir -p build && cd build; cmake ..; make -j4

tests.name: Test C implementation
tests.setup: sudo apt install libcriterion-dev; cd c; clang sum_to.c sum_to_test.c -o run_tests -l criterion

tests.name: Test Python implementation
tests.setup: cd py; sudo apt install python3-pytest
